name: cobalt.ilefa.club
description: An intelligent suite of tools built by UConn students, for UConn students.

scripts.dev: DORMS_TARGET=https://ilefa-cdn.s3.amazonaws.com/UConnDorms.json REACT_EDITOR=code-insiders NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_ENV=development NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA=$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print substr ($0, 0, 7)}') NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_MESSAGE=$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print substr ($0, 9)}') NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_RELEASE_CHANNEL=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) NEXT_PUBLIC_DEVICE=$(hostname) NEXT_PUBLIC_START=$(date +'%s') next
scripts.start:staging: DORMS_TARGET=https://ilefa-cdn.s3.amazonaws.com/UConnDorms.json REACT_EDITOR=code-insiders NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_ENV=preview NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA=$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print substr ($0, 0, 7)}') NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_MESSAGE=$(git log --oneline | head -1 | awk '{print substr ($0, 9)}') NEXT_PUBLIC_VERCEL_RELEASE_CHANNEL=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) NEXT_PUBLIC_DEVICE=$(hostname) NEXT_PUBLIC_START=$(date +'%s') next
